channel.title: How do i actualy 'import' handlers or make w-e lol
channel.description: Since handlers supposibly lower client sizes and can be good for less lag or w-e how would i be doing that like first of all i would add in all the methods/voids i have from my client of a skill say herblore and add it into a text file, save it as a java file and then what would i do? Import it to server.java like [code] objectHandler.process(); objectHandler.herblore();[/code] or what? [b][i]WOULD BE HIGHLY APPRECIATED XD[/i][/b]

item.title: How do i actualy 'import' handlers or make w-e lol
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Well, only because you’re just moving crap to another class and not actually getting rid of it.

Read full topic
